question:
With reference to the launch of integrated online Shagun initiative by the centre, consider the following statements:
  1. The portal was launched to monitor the progress in Sarva Sikha Abhiyan.
  2. The portal will provide online report cards of the students.
  3. The Integrated National School Education Treasury (INSET) will make use of deep machine learning.
Which of the above statements are correct?
explanation: Statement 1 is correct: The Shagun portal was launched in 2017 for monitoring the implementation of Sarva Sikha Abhiyan. The word \'Shagun’ is derived from ‘Shala’ (school) and ‘Gunvatta’ (quality). The portal has now integrated the websites of many schools like kendriya vidhyalayas, navodaya vidhyalayas, etc. Statement 2 is correct: The portal will now act as a single source of information. The report cards of students from 15 lakh schools will be available on this portal. Apart from this, information like navigable distance between the schools, school availability in a vicinity, public feedback on schools, etc. will also be available. Statement 3 is correct: The INSET has been set up recently to provide an integrated information network of aspects related to schools, teachers and students. The initiative will make use of deep machine learning and artificial intelligence to improve education quality. The focus will be on evidence based intervention.
